description:
An extendable, multi-use shovel from BCA featuring a big blade to move large volumes of snow quickly. The whole package breaks down small to leave room in your bag for your other backcountry gear.

  • Blade and shaft are aluminum, handle is made of plastic
  • Packable rectangular-section blade
  • D-grip handle for control and comfort
  • Extended length is 81cm, collapsed length is 40cm
name: Backcountry Access Dozer 3D Shovel
